description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Notification Title**
Multiple VICTORIA Class Spare Parts - Packing Performed, Unlatching Tool, Handset, Cables, O-rings, and Test Set - Radio Beacon

**Notice Reference Number**
PW-22-01008945

**Solicitation Number**
W8482-229947/B

**Publication Date**
2022-10-04

**Tender Closing Date**
14:00:00 (AST), 2022-11-16

**Request for Proposal**
The Department of National Defence of Canada is inviting proposal requests for the provision of multiple VICTORIA Class spare parts, including pre-formed packing, unlatching tools, handsets, cables, O-rings, and test sets for radio beacons.

**Delivery Location**
The delivery locations are Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Items Required**
The following items are required:

* Item 001: Pre-formed packing, NSN: 99-4956757, Quantity: 4; Unit of issue: EA
* Item 002: Pre-formed packing, NSN: 99-4956757, Quantity: 1; Unit of issue: EA
* Item 012: Test sets for radio beacons, NSN: 20-0116358, Quantity: 2; Unit of issue: EA
* Item 013: Test sets for radio beacons, NSN: 20-0116358, Quantity: 1; Unit of issue: EA

**Priorities:**

* The Department reserves the right to negotiate with prospective bidders.
* Bidders may propose equivalent or substitute products, which should include the brand name, model, Part number, and NCAGE.

**Language**
This Request for Proposal may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information:**

* A request for proposal notice and solicitation documents are available on the Canadabuys website.
* The Contact Information for inquiries and submissions is included below.

**Contact Information**
Aicha Diallo, AICHA.DIALLO@forces.gc.ca

Note: Best practices for tender announcements typically require keeping all information accurate and up-to-date. If any changes occur, you're expected to revise your entry accordingly.

Would you like to make any changes to any other entries in this government tender announcements document? Please let me know what kind of specifications you are looking for, whether they pertain to the language, format, or content of
